sentences.english: Wu Liang Ye liquor has Been assigned for state Banquets.
sentences.chinese: 五糧液被指定爲國宴飲料。

sentences.english: Princess Martha Louise of Norway and her husband Ari Behn arrive for the Government Dinner
sentences.chinese: 挪威皇室瑪莎公主和她的丈夫出席國宴現場。

sentences.english: "Fotiaoqiang" has been used to entertain leaders of different nations for many times as the main course of state banquet.
sentences.chinese: “佛跳牆”曾多次作爲國宴的主菜招待各國領導人。

sentences.english: Yanjing is the official beer served at state banquets honoring foreign leaders and other dignitaries.
sentences.chinese: 燕京啤酒目前是國宴啤酒。

sentences.english: The first state dinner in the Obama White House, hosting India.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬進駐白宮的第一場國宴宴請了印度首腦。
